explains: n. 沟通的人，交流者；发报机；通信员

sentences.en: The ideal candidate will be an effective communicator.
sentences.cn: 理想的候选人定要是善于沟通的人。

sentences.en: "I'm a great communicator, love meeting people , demonstrating blogging skills and immersing myself in other cultures, " he said
sentences.cn: 他说：“我是一个很好的沟通者，喜欢与人交流，展示博客技巧，喜欢沉浸在其他文化中。”

sentences.en: The architect is a good communicator
sentences.cn: 架构师是一位很好的沟通者
